content: I can tell you that there are many talented designers working today who are creating unique and innovative designs. only time will tell if any of them will have the same lasting impact on the fashion industry as the iconic designers of the 20th century. however, some modern designers who are already making waves in the industry and show great potential to have a long-lasting impact include virgil abloh, demna gvasalia, alessandro michele, maria grazia chiuri, and pierpaolo piccioli, to name a few.
